Mod.name: Tales of Kupoli
Mod.description:
v0.1
Bunch of random things - a few features, a few not features. (much) More to come. Enjoy!
~ROSETTA 0~ [i] Dearest Ikkuna, We found the *s$@8} you sent. Strangely enough in the desert caverns. If it works, these Rosettas should reach you on the otherside. We hope you can find %{!#0a^3 under one of your altars. Its the lava lake one I believe. The Hermits have made great advancements in their shard-fuelled robotics program so I fear I don't have much time left. Oh yeah, and we have managed to track that ruby thief to the Soul Grove. I've dispatched a party down to it so hopefully we should be able to make that 3/9 shards found. Anyways I should get going now. Glass to find and all. I love you. Goodbye. -V [/i]
if you have questions please contact my thermodynamic lawyer at https://discord.gg/FKaRA9HMUq thankyou
